comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: A Wikipedia list of German generals en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_German_colonel_generals includes: Gustav von Kessel 1846-1918, promoted in 1911 Adjutant general of the Empire, Commander-in-Chief in the so-called Marken and Governor of Berlin There is no English Wikipedia page for him, but there are other biographical pages: de.wikipedia.org/wiki/Gustav_von_Kessel home.comcast.net/~jcviser/aok/kessel.htm

comment.author: 34911459@N08
comment._content: Swang: thanks for the full name of Von Kessel and the additional background information.  We will update the data to include his full name.
